sentences.sContent: The region’s heavy industry is still inefficient and moribund.
sentences.sCn: 该地区的重工业依然效率低下，没有活力。

sentences.sContent: A cut in interest rates will help the country’s moribund housing market.
sentences.sCn: 利率的下调对于该国疲软的住房市场将起到促进作用。

remMethod.val: mori(=mort死) + bund(接近的) → 垂死的

trans.tranCn: 即将结束的； 垂死的
trans.tranOther: a moribund organization, industry, etc is no longer active or effective and may be coming to an end
